omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	coalesce(max(apc.DeliveryDate), max(apc.CDSActivityDate)) as observation_date, 
	apc.GestationLengthLabourOnset
from omop_staging.sus_APC as apc																			
where apc.NHSNumber is not null
  and apc.GestationLengthLabourOnset is not null
  and apc.CDSType in ('120', '140')
group by 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier, 
    apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	apc.DeliveryDate, 
	apc.GestationLengthLabourOnset;

omopColumns.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier

dataSource.name: GeneratedRecordIdentifier
dataSource.description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.

omopColumns.query:
select 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	coalesce(max(apc.DeliveryDate), max(apc.CDSActivityDate)) as observation_date, 
	apc.GestationLengthLabourOnset
from omop_staging.sus_APC as apc																			
where apc.NHSNumber is not null
  and apc.GestationLengthLabourOnset is not null
  and apc.CDSType in ('120', '140')
group by 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier, 
    apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	apc.DeliveryDate, 
	apc.GestationLengthLabourOnset;

omopColumns.name: observation_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `40493181`. Length of gestation at time of procedure

omopColumns.name: observation_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `38000280`. Observation recorded from EHR

omopColumns.name: HospitalProviderSpellNumber

dataSource.name: HospitalProviderSpellNumber
dataSource.description: CDS specific hospital spell number that binds many episodes together.

omopColumns.query:
select 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	coalesce(max(apc.DeliveryDate), max(apc.CDSActivityDate)) as observation_date, 
	apc.GestationLengthLabourOnset
from omop_staging.sus_APC as apc																			
where apc.NHSNumber is not null
  and apc.GestationLengthLabourOnset is not null
  and apc.CDSType in ('120', '140')
group by 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier, 
    apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	apc.DeliveryDate, 
	apc.GestationLengthLabourOnset;

omopColumns.name: value_as_number

dataSource.name: GestationLengthLabourOnset
dataSource.description: GESTATION LENGTH (LABOUR ONSET) records a period of between 10 to 49 weeks in completed weeks at the onset of Labour.

omopColumns.query:
select 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
	apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	coalesce(max(apc.DeliveryDate), max(apc.CDSActivityDate)) as observation_date, 
	apc.GestationLengthLabourOnset
from omop_staging.sus_APC as apc																			
where apc.NHSNumber is not null
  and apc.GestationLengthLabourOnset is not null
  and apc.CDSType in ('120', '140')
group by 
	apc.NHSNumber, 
	apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier, 
    apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
	apc.DeliveryDate, 
	apc.GestationLengthLabourOnset;
